titleStmt.title: A safe and easy method for supplying the want of coin and raising as many millions as the occasions of the publick may require. Humbly offered to the consideration of the present Parliament. With some remarks upon the Bank of England, Dr. Chamberlain's Bank, the Land-Bank, so called, and the National Land-Bank.
titleStmt.author: Atwood, William, d. 1705?

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Roger Clavel, at the Peacock in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
